contentrichtext.text: The '''Victorian Internet Exchange''' is an [[Internet Exchange Point]] in [[Australia]]. Formed from the [[Australian Internet Exchange]] (AUIX) project, VIX is located in the Melbourne [[AAPT Limited|AAPT]] Exchange and offers multi-lateral [[peering]]. * Note AAPT site is long since defunct. there is a "VIX" run by WAIX; ==References== * http://www.waia.asn.au/content/new-carrier-neutral-peering-point-melbourne [[Category:Internet exchange points in Australia]] {{Compu-network-stub}} {{Internet-stub}} {{Melbourne-stub}}
